title: Hunting Out The Trades In The London Forex Session
text:
A thoroughly enjoyable forex session which ran well over time as we were enjoying it so much and as always plenty to talk about, explain and analyze. And in every time frame from the monthly to the minute chart, starting with the .

There are many interesting aspects to this pair not least the monthly chart with a huge volume spike last month, and helping to propel the pair back to the VPOC and onwards higher and is perhaps the precursor for a breakaway from this extended congestion area and the development of a longer term trend higher.

An interesting pair to watch and trade for many reasons. Then we moved to the faster timeframes to dig out intraday trading opportunities using volume price analysis and the Quantum Trading indicators and tools on NinjaTrader and MT5.
description: Forex Analysis by Anna Coulling covering: GBP/NZD. Read Anna Coulling's latest article on Investing.com
